title: How to Clone Items in Pokémon Red, Blue, or Yellow

steps.title: Beat the gym leader that will give you the HM Fly.
steps.content: Beat the gym leader that will give you the HM Fly.

steps.title: Get HM Fly in the house north of Cycling Road.
steps.content: Get HM Fly in the house north of Cycling Road.

steps.title: Fly to Viridian City via HM Fly.
steps.content: Fly to Viridian City via HM Fly. Make sure to teach it to a suitable Pokémon.

steps.title: Find the Old Man by walking north and talking to him.
steps.content: Find the Old Man by walking north and talking to him. When he asks if you're in a hurry, say "No" and have him show you how to catch a Pokémon. This will activate the glitch.

steps.title: Equip the item you want to clone as the 6th item from the top.
steps.content: Equip the item you want to clone as the 6th item from the top.

steps.title: Surf along the south coast of the island until you encounter a "Missingo."
steps.content: Surf along the south coast of the island until you encounter a "Missingo." or " 'M ".

steps.title: Check your bag.
steps.content: Check your bag. The 6th item from the top will be cloned to 128! If you did it correctly, it shows a glitchy symbol next to the cloned item. Don't worry, your game will be fine.
